item.description:
Helping Our Animals, Healing Ourselves:

How Holistic End of Life and Palliative Care for Pets Transforms

 

Heather Merrill, A.B., J.D., C.T., is a Social Thanatologist and the Founder and Director of New England Pet Hospice and Home Care (NEPHHC), the region's only hospice and palliative care service for pets following the interdisciplinary model of human hospice and palliative care.  With a team of 18 professionals, NEPHHC is the country's largest and most respected pet hospice service.

 

 

Potluck lunch from 11:30 am - 12:15 pm

Presentation from 12:15 - 1:15 pm

 

$10 meetup fee
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome you at the door
item.name: April Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
